DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: (declarations)
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script: Declare Sub PCS_Processar(oInputs As PropertySet, oOutputs As PropertySet) Declare Sub PCS_Chama_Wf(sIdMeio As String, pOutputs As PropertySet) Declare Sub PCS_Marca_conta(sIdInvoice As String, pStatus as String) Declare Sub PCS_Cria_Controle(sIdInvoice As String, pErroMovel as String, pErroFixo as String, pErroTV as String, pReExec as String) Declare Sub subInterfaceTV(Inputs As PropertySet, Outputs As PropertySet,sIdSHB As String, sIdInvoice as String , iContador as Integer, iQteMaxRes as Integer, sEvento As String)

DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: PCS_Chama_Wf
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script:
Sub PCS_Chama_Wf(sIdMeio As String, pOutputs As PropertySet)
Dim svc As Service Dim Inputs As PropertySet
Set Inputs = TheApplication.NewPropertySet()
set svc = TheApplication.GetService("Workflow Process Manager")
Inputs.SetProperty "ProcessName", "PCS_Provisiona_OS_Desbloqueio_Confianca"
Inputs.SetProperty "Object Id", sIdMeio
svc.InvokeMethod "RunProcess", Inputs, pOutputs
Set Inputs = Nothing Set Outputs = Nothing set svc = Nothing
End Sub

DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: PCS_Cria_Controle
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script:
Sub PCS_Cria_Controle(sIdInvoice As String, pErroMovel as String, pErroFixo as String, pErroTV as String, pReExec as String)
theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - inicio: " + pErroMovel +";"+ pErroFixo +";"+ pErroTV
Dim oBO As BusObject Dim oBC As BusComp
'** joga para fila para processamento batch Set oBO = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS Requisicao EAI") Set oBC = oBO.GetBusComp("PCS Requisicao EAI")
With oBC .ClearToQuery .ActivateField "PCS Status" .ActivateField "PCS Origem Solicitacao" .ActivateField "PCS Chave Requisicao" .ActivateField "PCS Recebimento Requisicao" .ActivateField "PCS Origem Id" .ActivateField "PCS Descricao" '** ERRO FIXO .ActivateField "PCS Evento" '** ERRO MOVEL .ActivateField "PCS Envio Requisicao" '** ERRO TV
.SetSearchSpec "PCS Origem Solicitacao", "PCS_DESBL_CONF_BATCH" .SetSearchSpec "PCS Status", "PendenteDesblCont" .SetSearchSpec "PCS Chave Requisicao", sIdInvoice .ExecuteQuery
theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 0" If .FirstRecord = 0 then theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 1" If pErroFixo = "Y" or pErroMovel = "Y" or pErroTV = "Y" then theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 2" .NewRecord NewBefore .SetFieldValue "PCS Status", "PendenteDesblCont" .SetFieldValue "PCS Origem Solicitacao", "PCS_DESBL_CONF_BATCH" .SetFieldValue "PCS Chave Requisicao", sIdInvoice .SetFieldValue "PCS Recebimento Requisicao", Trim(Environ$("COMPUTERNAME")) .SetFieldValue "PCS Descricao", pErroFixo .SetFieldValue "PCS Evento", pErroMovel .SetFieldValue "PCS Envio Requisicao", pErroTV .SetFieldValue "PCS Origem Id", "1" .WriteRecord End If Else theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 3" If pErroFixo <> "Y" and pErroMovel <> "Y" and pErroTV <> "Y" then theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 4" .SetFieldValue "PCS Status", "Executado" End If theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 5" .SetFieldValue "PCS Recebimento Requisicao", Trim(Environ$("COMPUTERNAME")) .SetFieldValue "PCS Descricao", pErroFixo .SetFieldValue "PCS Evento", pErroMovel .SetFieldValue "PCS Envio Requisicao", pErroTV .SetFieldValue "PCS Origem Id", Int(.GetFieldValue("PCS Origem Id")) + 1 .WriteRecord End If End With
If pReExec = "Y" and pErroFixo <> "Y" and pErroMovel <> "Y" and pErroTV <> "Y" then
theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 6" Dim oBOSolicitacao As BusObject Dim oBCSolicitacao As BusComp
Set oBOSolicitacao = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS Account - Workflow") Set oBCSolicitacao = oBOSolicitacao.GetBusComp("PCS CUT Billing Transaction Only To Insert")
With oBCSolicitacao .SetViewMode AllView .ActivateField "PCS Tipo Solicitacao" .ClearToQuery .SetSearchSpec "PCS Tipo Solicitacao", "Desbloqueio - Aberto" .SetSearchSpec "Account Id", sIdInvoice .ExecuteQuery ForwardOnly If .FirstRecord <> 0 Then theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - 7" .SetFieldValue "PCS Tipo Solicitacao", "Desbloqueio - Fechado" .WriteRecord End If
End With
Set oBCSolicitacao = Nothing Set oBOSolicitacao = Nothing
End If
Set oBC = Nothing Set oBO = Nothing theapplication.trace "PCS_Cria_Controle - fim"
End Sub

DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: PCS_Marca_conta
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script:
Sub PCS_Marca_conta(sIdInvoice As String, pStatus as String)
Dim oBO As BusObject Dim oBC As BusComp
Set oBO = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS Objetos Light") Set oBC = oBO.GetBusComp("PCS Account Light No Link")
With oBC .ClearToQuery .SetViewMode AllView .ActivateField "PCS Status Desbloqueio Confianca" .SetSearchSpec "Id", sIdInvoice .ExecuteQuery If .FirstRecord then .SetFieldValue "PCS Status Desbloqueio Confianca", pStatus .WriteRecord End If End With
Set oBC = Nothing Set oBO = Nothing
End Sub

DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: PCS_Processar
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script:
Sub PCS_Processar(oInputs As PropertySet, oOutputs As PropertySet)
Dim oBOMeio As BusObject Dim oBCMeio As BusComp Dim iReg As Integer Dim sSQL As String
Dim oBOLight As BusObject Dim oBCLight As BusComp Dim oBSSincFixo As Service Dim InputsFixo As PropertySet Dim OutputsFixo As PropertySet Dim oBOLov As BusObject Dim oBCLov As BusComp Dim iContador As Integer Dim iQteMaxRes As Integer Dim sOnOff As String
Dim sEtapa as String Dim oBS As Service Set oBS = TheApplication.GetService("PCS Gera Log Generico")
On Error GoTo FimErro
'** ARS 10953353 Dim sMsgErro as String If Len(oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id")) = 0 then sMsgErro = "Id da Conta n√£o informado" GoTo FimErro End If
sIdInvoice = oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id")
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 0: " + oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id")
Theapplication.trace "Teste Uillas Processa 0: " + oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id") Call PCS_Marca_conta(oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id"),"Enviando")
'** ARS 8139774 sErroMovel = "N" sErroFixo = "N" sErroTV = "N" sReExec = "N"
sEtapa = "0" iContador = 0
TheApplication.SetProfileAttr "spName", "PKE000000022235_COUNT" TheApplication.InvokeMethod("SearchSysPref")
TheApplication.Trace "PKE000000022235_COUNT: " & TheApplication.GetProfileAttr("spValue") iQteMaxRes = Int(TheApplication.GetProfileAttr("spValue"))
TheApplication.SetProfileAttr "spName", "PKE000000022235_ONOFF" TheApplication.InvokeMethod("SearchSysPref")
TheApplication.Trace "PKE000000022235_ONOFF: " & TheApplication.GetProfileAttr("spValue") sOnOff = TheApplication.GetProfileAttr("spValue")
Dim oBO As BusObject Dim oBC As BusComp
Set oBO = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS Requisicao EAI") Set oBC = oBO.GetBusComp("PCS Requisicao EAI")
With oBC .ClearToQuery .ActivateField "PCS Status" .ActivateField "PCS Origem Solicitacao" .ActivateField "PCS Chave Requisicao" .ActivateField "PCS Recebimento Requisicao" .ActivateField "PCS Descricao" '** ERRO FIXO .ActivateField "PCS Evento" '** ERRO MOVEL .ActivateField "PCS Envio Requisicao" '** ERRO TV
.SetSearchSpec "PCS Origem Solicitacao", "" .SetSearchSpec "PCS Status", "PendenteDesblCont" .SetSearchSpec "PCS Chave Requisicao", sIdInvoice .ExecuteQuery
If .FirstRecord > 0 then sExecFixo = .GetFieldValue("PCS Descricao") sExecMovel = .GetFieldValue("PCS Evento") sExecTV = .GetFieldValue("PCS Envio Requisicao") sReExec = "Y" Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 2: " + .GetFieldValue("PCS Descricao") +"/"+ .GetFieldValue("PCS Evento") +"/"+ .GetFieldValue("PCS Envio Requisicao") sEtapa = sEtapa + ";1" End If End With
Set oBC = Nothing Set oBO = Nothing
If sReExec = "Y" then If sExecMovel = "Y" then GoTo ExecMovel Elseif sExecFixo = "Y" then GoTo ExecFixo Elseif sExecTV = "Y" then GoTo ExecTV End If End If
ExecMovel:
Set oBOMeio = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS Objetos Light") Set oBCMeio = oBOMeio.GetBusComp("Com Quote Solution for Query")
With oBCMeio .SetViewMode AllView .ActivateField "Invoice Account Id" .ActivateField "Copied" .ActivateField "Status Code" .ActivateField "Bloqueio Venda Remota" .ActivateField "PCS Hotline Cobranca" .ActivateField "PCS Susp Parc Inad" .ActivateField "PCS Susp Tot Inad" .ActivateField "PCS Status Desbloqueio Confianca" .ClearToQuery
sSQL = "[Status Code] <> 'Deleted' AND [Status Code] <> 'Inativo' AND [Copied] = 'N' AND [Invoice Account Id]= " & "'" & oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id") & "'" Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 3: " + sSQL .SetSearchExpr sSQL .ExecuteQuery iReg = .FirstRecord End With
sEtapa = sEtapa + ";2"
Do While iReg <> 0 Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 4: " + oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Id") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") '** PKE000000003681 If oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") <> "Ativo" and oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") <> "Suspenso" and oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") <> "Bloqueado" then Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 5: " + oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Id") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") sErroMovel = "Y"
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Erro1: " + oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Id")
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs
end if iReg = oBCMeio.NextRecord Loop
iReg = oBCMeio.FirstRecord Do While iReg <> 0
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 6: " + oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Id") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Hotline Cobranca") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Susp Parc Inad") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Susp Tot Inad") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Bloqueio Venda Remota") +";"+ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Status Desbloqueio Confianca")
'** ARS 8139774 If (oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Hotline Cobranca") = "Y" or _ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Susp Parc Inad") = "Y" or _ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Susp Tot Inad") = "Y") and _ oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Bloqueio Venda Remota") <> "Y" and _ (Instr(oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Status Desbloqueio Confianca"),"Solicitado") > 0 or oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("PCS Status Desbloqueio Confianca") = "Erro") and _ (oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") = "Ativo" or oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Status Code") = "Suspenso") then
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 7" Call PCS_Chama_Wf(oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Id"),oOutputs)
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 8: " + oOutputs.GetProperty("Error Code") +";"+ oOutputs.GetProperty("Error Message") If Len(oOutputs.GetProperty("Error Code")) > 0 then Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 9" sErroMovel = "Y"
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Erro2: " + oBCMeio.GetFieldValue("Id") +"->"+ oOutputs.GetProperty("Error Message")
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs
End If
end if
iReg = oBCMeio.NextRecord Loop
'sErroMovel = Inputbox("Erro no Movel?")
ExecFixo:
sEtapa = sEtapa + ";3"
If sReExec = "Y" and sExecFixo = "N" then GoTo ExecTV End If
'Ini DC 35481 - Izabel Albuquerque Set oBOLight = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS Objetos Light") Set oBCLight = oBOLight.GetBusComp("Com Quote Item Light")
With oBCLight .ClearToQuery .SetViewMode AllView .ActivateField "Quote Id" .ActivateField "PCS Historico Acao" .SetSearchSpec "Inv Account Id", oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id") .SetSearchSpec "PCS Classe OS Plena", "Fixo Convergente" .SetSearchSpec "PCS Historico Acao", "Bloqueado STC"
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 10: " + .GetSearchExpr .ExecuteQuery ForwardOnly iReg = .FirstRecord End With
sEtapa = sEtapa + ";4"
If iReg <> 0 Then Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 11" Set oBSSincFixo = TheApplication.GetService("PCS STC Sincrona Convergente") Set InputsFixo = TheApplication.NewPropertySet() Set OutputsFixo = TheApplication.NewPropertySet()
InputsFixo.SetProperty "PCSAcao","DesbloqueioFixo" InputsFixo.SetProperty "PCSSharedBundleId", oBCLight.GetFieldValue("Quote Id")
oBSSincFixo.InvokeMethod "ExecutaSincronaWorkflow", InputsFixo, OutputsFixo
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 12: " + OutputsFixo.GetProperty("ReturnedAcao") sEtapa = sEtapa + ";5:"+oBCLight.GetFieldValue("Quote Id")+";"+OutputsFixo.GetProperty("ReturnedAcao") If OutputsFixo.GetProperty("ReturnedAcao") = "OK" Then Set oBOLov = TheApplication.GetBusObject("List Of Values") Set oBCLov = oBOLov.GetBusComp("List Of Values")
With oBCLov .SetViewMode AllView .ClearToQuery
.ActivateField "High"
.SetSearchSpec "Type", "PCS_ICS_ACAO_FIXO" .SetSearchSpec "Low", "DesbloqueioFixo" .SetSearchSpec "Active", "Y" .ExecuteQuery ForwardOnly
If oBCLov.FirstRecord = 0 Then GoTo ExecTV End If
With oBCLight .ExecuteQuery .SetFieldValue "PCS Historico Acao", oBCLov.GetFieldValue("High") .WriteRecord End With
End With Else '** ARS 8139774 Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 13: " + oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id") +";"+ OutputsFixo.GetProperty("ReturnedAcao") sErroFixo = "Y"
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Erro3: " + OutputsFixo.GetProperty("ReturnedAcao")
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs End If 'Fim DC 35481 - RMN End If
ExecTV:
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 14" If sReExec = "Y" and sExecTV = "N" then GoTo PulaTV End If
'Dim oBOTV As BusObject 'Dim oBCTV As BusComp
Set oBO = TheApplication.GetBusObject("PCS TV Object") Set oBC = oBO.GetBusComp("PCS TV BC")
sEtapa = sEtapa + ";6"
With oBC .SetViewMode AllView .ClearToQuery .ActivateField "PCS SB Id" .ActivateField "Status Code" .ActivateField "Action" .ActivateField "PCS Historico Acao" .ActivateField "Oi Ind Sus Parcial TV" 'PRJ16537 .SetSearchSpec "Invoice Account Id", sIdInvoice .SetSearchSpec "PCS Historico Acao", "Bloqueado*" .SetSearchSpec "PCS Classe OS Plena", "Oi TV" .ExecuteQuery
If .FirstRecord > 0 then Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 15"
Dim Inputs As PropertySet Dim Outputs As PropertySet
Set Inputs = TheApplication.NewPropertySet() Set Outputs = TheApplication.NewPropertySet()
Dim svc As Service
TheApplication.SetProfileAttr "lovValue", TheApplication.LoginName TheApplication.SetProfileAttr "lovType" , "PCS_LISTA_USUARIO_SERVIDOR" TheApplication.InvokeMethod("SearchLOV")
If Len(TheApplication.GetProfileAttr("lovName")) <> 0 Then Set svc = TheApplication.GetService("EAI Business Integration Manager (Server Request)") Else Set svc = TheApplication.GetService("Workflow Process Manager") End If
'** PKE000000017351 Set oBOLov = TheApplication.GetBusObject("List Of Values") Set oBCLov = oBOLov.GetBusComp("List Of Values")
With oBCLov
.ClearToQuery .SetViewMode AllView .ActivateField "Description" .ActivateField "Value" .ActivateField "High" .SetSearchSpec "Active", "Y" .SetSearchSpec "Type", "PCS_ICS_ACAO_TV" .SetSearchSpec "Name", "TV - Desbloqueio de sinal P"
.ExecuteQuery ForwardOnly
If .FirstRecord = 0 then TheApplication.Trace "Trace PCS Processar 15.1" GoTo PulaTV End If
End With
If sOnOff = "Y" Then
Inputs.SetProperty "Evento", oBCLov.GetFieldValue("Value") Inputs.SetProperty "RowId", .GetFieldValue("PCS SB Id") Inputs.SetProperty "ProcessName", "PCS #P - Enviar Oi TV"
svc.InvokeMethod "RunProcess", Inputs, Outputs Else
Inputs.SetProperty "RowId", .GetFieldValue("PCS SB Id") iContador = iContador + 1 Call subInterfaceTV(Inputs, Outputs, .GetFieldValue("PCS SB Id"), sIdInvoice, iContador, iQteMaxRes, oBCLov.GetFieldValue("Value"))
End If
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 16: " + Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code") +"-"+ Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message") sEtapa = sEtapa + ";7:"+.GetFieldValue("PCS SB Id")+";"+Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code") If Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code") <> "0" Or Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code SOA") <> "0" then sErroTV = "Y"
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Erro4: " + Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code") +"-"+ Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message")
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs
'** Atualizar TV com erro!! oBC.SetFieldValue "Status Code", "Erro" oBC.SetFieldValue "Action", "Desbloquear" oBC.WriteRecord
TheApplication.Trace "Trace PCS Processar 16.1" Else '** Atualizar TV de acordo com acao!! oBC.SetFieldValue "Status Code", oBCLov.GetFieldValue("High") oBC.SetFieldValue "PCS Historico Acao", oBCLov.GetFieldValue("Description") oBC.SetFieldValue "Oi Ind Sus Parcial TV","N" 'PRJ16537 oBC.WriteRecord TheApplication.Trace "Trace PCS Processar 16.2"
End If
Set Inputs = Nothing Set Outputs = Nothing set svc = Nothing
End If
End With
Set oBC = Nothing Set oBO = Nothing
PulaTV:
'** ARS 8139774 Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 17: " + sReExec +"/"+ sErroMovel +"/"+ sErroFixo +"/"+ sExecTV +"/"+ oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id") sEtapa = sEtapa + ";8" Call PCS_Cria_Controle(oInputs.GetProperty("Object Id"), sErroMovel, sErroFixo, sErroTV, sReExec)
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Final: " + sEtapa
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs
GoTo Final
FimErro: oOutputs.SetProperty "Error Code", "-1" '** ARS 10953353 oOutputs.SetProperty "Error Message", sMsgErro +"/"+ Error(Err) Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar Erro: " + Error(Err)
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice '** ARS 10953353 oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Erro5: " + sMsgErro +"/"+ Error(Err)
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs
Final: Set oBCMeio = Nothing Set oBOMeio = Nothing
Set InputsFixo = Nothing Set OutputsFixo = Nothing Set oBSSincFixo = Nothing
Set oBCLight = Nothing Set oBOLight = Nothing
Set oBCLov = Nothing Set oBOLov = Nothing
Set oBS = Nothing End Sub

DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: Service_PreInvokeMethod
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script:
Function Service_PreInvokeMethod (MethodName As String, Inputs As PropertySet, Outputs As PropertySet) As Integer
Service_PreInvokeMethod = CancelOperation
Select Case MethodName
Case "Executa"
Outputs.SetProperty "Error Code","0" Outputs.SetProperty "Error Message",""
Call PCS_Processar(Inputs, Outputs) Case Else Service_PreInvokeMethod = ContinueOperation End Select
End Function

DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Name: subInterfaceTV
DevopsRepositoryBusinessServiceScript.Script:
Sub subInterfaceTV(Inputs As PropertySet, Outputs As PropertySet,sIdSHB As String, sIdInvoice as String , iContador as Integer, iQteMaxRes as Integer, sEvento as String)
Dim oInputs As PropertySet Dim oOutputs As PropertySet Dim svc As Service Dim oBS As Service
On Error GoTo FimErro
Set oInputs = TheApplication.NewPropertySet() Set oOutputs = TheApplication.NewPropertySet() Set oBS = TheApplication.GetService("PCS Gera Log Generico")
Theapplication.trace "Trace subInterfaceTV Qdte Erro: " + str(iContator) TheApplication.SetProfileAttr "lovValue", TheApplication.LoginName TheApplication.SetProfileAttr "lovType" , "PCS_LISTA_USUARIO_SERVIDOR" TheApplication.InvokeMethod("SearchLOV")
If Len(TheApplication.GetProfileAttr("lovName")) <> 0 Then Set svc = TheApplication.GetService("EAI Business Integration Manager (Server Request)") Else Set svc = TheApplication.GetService("Workflow Process Manager") End If
Inputs.SetProperty "Evento", sEvento Inputs.SetProperty "RowId", sIdSHB Inputs.SetProperty "ProcessName", "PCS #P - Enviar Oi TV"
svc.InvokeMethod "RunProcess", Inputs, Outputs
Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar 16: " + Outputs.GetProperty("Error Code") +"-"+ Outputs.GetProperty("Error Message")
GoTo Final
FimErro: oOutputs.SetProperty "Error Code", "-1" '** ARS 10953353 oOutputs.SetProperty "Error Message", sMsgErro +"/"+ Error(Err) Theapplication.trace "Trace PCS Processar Erro: " + Error(Err)
TheApplication.Trace "Trace subInterfaceTV : " + str(Err) +"/"+ str(iContador) +"/"+ str(iQteMaxRes)
If iContador < iQteMaxRes Then
Call subInterfaceTV(Inputs , Outputs ,sIdSHB , sIdInvoice, iContador+1 , iQteMaxRes, sEvento)
Else
Theapplication.trace "Trace subInterfaceTV Log: " + str(iContador)
oInputs.SetProperty "Origem", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Evento", "PCSLogDesblConf" oInputs.SetProperty "Id Pai", sIdInvoice '** ARS 10953353 oInputs.SetProperty "Descricao1", "Erro5: " + sMsgErro +"/"+ Error(Err)
oBS.InvokeMethod "Gerar", oInputs, oOutputs End If
Final:
Set oInputs = Nothing Set oOutputs = Nothing Set svc = Nothing Set oBS = Nothing End Sub
